idea-plugin.name: Quick Memo
idea-plugin.description:
Just open to take notes in your IDE

생각을 뇌에서 놓아주세요. 그냥 메모하세요


Default Keymap:

  • macOS: Option + M
  • Windows/Linux: Ctrl + Q

Set up your preferred shortcut:

  1. Settings/Preferences -> Keymap
  2. Search "Open/Close Quick Memo"
  3. Change keymap
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1. Changed default MacOS shortcut from 'Option + Shift + M' to 'Option + M' for better accessibility
  2. Added text size adjustment feature using Ctrl + Mouse Wheel
  3. Added toast popup notification when creating a new memo
  4. Added default padding to text input area in TextArea for improved readability
  1. MacOS 단축키 'Option + M'로 변경
  2. Ctrl + Mouse Wheel로 폰트 크기 조절 가능
  3. 메모 추가시 toast popup으로 알림
  4. TextArea에 기본 패딩 추가 (기존엔 딱 붙어 있었다.)
